fields_of_interest: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
RUSI broadly monitors and analyses: 
- EU foreign policy  
- European External Action Service  
- The coordination of the Common Security and Defence Policy and, the EU Neighbourhood Policy.  
 
The International Security Studies, Nuclear, and Defence Industry Groups at RUSI follow: 
- Relations with Russia, Ukraine, China and the Middle East.  
- Sanctions policy and nuclear proliferation  
- EU Security Strategy 
 
The National Security and Resilience (NSR) Studies Group at RUSI focuses on: 
 
- EU Drugs Action Plan  
- EU Counter-Terrorism Strategy  
- Directive on Trafficking in Human Beings  
- EU Cyber Security Strategy 
- EU’s Counter-Terrorism Coordinator actions 
- 4th EU Anti-Money Laundering Directives  
- Regulation on Information on the Payer Accompanying Transfers of Funds 
- EU Data Protection Package 
- Confiscation and asset recovery legislation
organisation_name: The Royal United Services Institute for Defence and Security Studies (RUSI)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
RUSI EU projects include: 
 
- CORMS Cocaine Route Monitoring and Support  
http://www.cocaineroute.eu/ 
 
- CRIMSON Critical Maritime Routes Monitoring, Support and Evaluation 
- STRIVE Strengthening Resilience on Violent Extremism ( Ethiopia, Kenya and Somalia) 
 
We will regularly host events in Brussels related to the above-mentioned projects as well the broader RUSI focus areas.
goals__remit: To study, promote, debate, report and provide options on all issues relating to national and international defence and security.
